pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.7: That is, five hundred bow-lengths. [See essay on Measures.]
pli-tv-bu-vb-np29:2.53: “Taking on trust” refers to a situation where you have an agreement with a close friend that you may take their belongings on trust. The conditions for taking on trust are set out at [Kd.8:19.1.5](pli-tv-kd8:19.1.5).
